I have scaled these custom solutions to new rich media features, which are industry leading. These features have been important to the rich media product as they are a differentiating technological factor against competitors. Such features include: Page scraping, Web Scraping and Right click menus. I also helped identify the need for the current Dynamic ads solution. After initial conception I applied my logical mind to suggest additions and improvements to the product. As well as being one of the core team members tasked with building the tool, I have written documentation, given presentations (internally and externally), given numerous training sessions, and supported the product. I built strong relationships with the account mangers and sales operation manager to ensure this compliance with Microsoft policy while still meeting the advertisers’ requirements. Ultimately I utilised my technical and interpersonal skills to balance the users’ and advertisers’ needs. Summary I consider myself an Intrapreneur at Google: I focus on programmatic buying for the DoubleClick Ad Exchange, helping my clients and team better understand the complex landscape and tools for how to buy efficiently and at scale on one of the largest inventory pools in the world! Think of it like a stock exchange for ads, where my buyer clients are buying in real time, impression by impression, across desktop, mobile, video to help optimize how advertising works and delivers on behalf of their advertising clients.  
 
Other things I enjoy doing at Google and beyond: 
- Hosting talks@google for authors who I think have great messages and books to read, usually about conscious awareness and shifting behavior having more impact in the world. Check out who I've hosted on my web site below. 
- Google "20% time" mindfulness program volunteer  
- Huffington Post Blogger and author of forthcoming book Pause 
- Board Member, Business for the Planet http://www.b4p.us/ 
- Improving myself and others every day. It may be through my personal development work in social and emotional intelligence, conscious leadership, acquiring new skills, coaching or training others.
